str2: Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary, but obsolete omo, for which another prolonged form omoo is used in certain tenses; to swear, i.e. Take oath.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From katapauo; reposing down, i.e. abode.
